description: React component for a Notifications Page with features like filtering, searching, marking notifications as read/unread, and resetting local state. It manages notifications stored in localStorage and interacts with external utility functions and state management.

methods.name: toSearchText
methods.description: Converts a value to lowercase string for search purposes.

methods.name: toTime
methods.description: Parses ISO date string to timestamp, returns NaN if invalid.

methods.name: formatWhen
methods.description: Formats a date value into a locale string or returns a placeholder if invalid.

methods.name: NotificationsPage
methods.description: Main React functional component for the notifications page, managing state and rendering notification list with controls.
